info.author: Tom De Smedt, Vincent Van Asch, Walter Daelemans
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License (GPL)
info.description: MBSP is a text analysis system based on the TiMBL and MBT memory based learning applications developed at CLiPS and ILK. It provides tools for tokenization and sentence splitting, part-of-speech tagging, chunking, lemmatization, relation finding and prepositional phrase (PP) attachment.
info.keywords: NLP, CL, natural language processing, computational linguistics, parsing, tagging, tokenization, syntax, linguistics
info.name: MBSP-for-Python
info.html_description: MBSP is a text analysis system based on the TiMBL and MBT memory based learning applications developed at CLiPS and ILK. It provides tools for tokenization and sentence splitting, part-of-speech tagging, chunking, lemmatization, relation finding and prepositional phrase (PP) attachment.
